SEARCH
Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.headers.cache

Class CacheControl

java.lang.Object
io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.headers.cache.CacheControl
public final class CacheControl extends Object
Cache Control for HTTP response. 
     
     // Example code 1
     var cacheControl = new CacheControl()
          .setMaxAge(3600L).setMustRevalidate(true);
     
     
     // Example code 2
     var cacheControl = new CacheControl()
          .setNoCache(true);
Since:
v1.0.0
See Also:
  • HttpResponse
  • HTTP Caching (rfc9111)

    • processOutgoingCacheControl

      public static String processOutgoingCacheControl(CacheControl cacheControl)
      Process provided CacheControl instance as a Cache-Control HTTP header.
      Parameters:
      cacheControl - CacheControl instance
      Returns:
      Cache-Control header string
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • CacheControl
      API Note:
      This method is public but not useful for the API users. Only used for in-API tasks.
